item.title: ATC Transponders and Automatic Altitude Reporting Systems – One Inoperative

note.para: Transponder failure will cause ADS-B Out Functions to be inoperative unless crew selects operative Transponder/GPS combination for ADS-B Out Transmissions.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: One combination of GPS #1/Transponder #1 or GPS #2/Transponder #2 must be operative to ensure ADS-B Out functionality. If not, Flight Control to ensure ADS-B out is not required along planned route (e.g. Hudson Bay, etc.). Reference IOM Communications Section for Limitations and Procedures.

placard.para: Placard near Transponder Selector Switch: "___TRANSPONDER INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
